choices: A friend of someone of the family.
12.content:
"There, I have done it." You say proud as you just tightened the last bolt on your machine. You wipe away the sweat of your forehead as you look outside the window. It's terrible hot, though the sun isn't shining. Dark clouds have gathered and it's only minutes waiting before lighting hits. And that's what you hope.

The brain switcher you have invented consists of two helmets connected to each other by the actual machine. Problem is that the machine will use a huge amount of electricity to work. You could try plug it inside the house, but the bill for it would be too much to pay for. So that's when you realized the lightning storm could solve your problems.

The only thing you have to do now is attach the lightning rod to the flagpole just outside your room. Your only worry is that you're not on time as you can hear it rumbling outside. You quickly grab the rod and open up the window of your room. The flagpole it just underneath. As you just push it inside lightning hits the rod. As you are still holding the rod, your body instantly paralyzes and the brain switcher activates. It's only a matter of seconds before you can move again. A bit wobbly you walk backwards and fall to the ground as everything turns black.

When you wake up again, you still feel a little dizzy by the shock. Remembering next time you do something like this to wear rubber gloves. You stand up again and look at the brain switcher. It's completely broken, to repair it again would take months.

With nothing much to do you decide to go downstairs and get you something to eat and drink. When you touch the iron doorknob of your room you feel a little shock. You're probably static. Seeing as it might wear off you continue going downstairs to the kitchen and open the refrigerator.

Just as you are about to grab something you feel someone touching your shoulder. You feel paralyzed when all of a sudden you look at the back of your body. You're now in the body of...
12.title: u get the power to swap bodies with people
